Global

Methods

eggRepl()

This function will initiate the Egg REPL. It uses the readline module, which provides an interface for reading data one line at a time. It listens to 3 events: 1. The line event, when the users press enter with any input. 2. The close event, to end the REPL. 3. The SIGINT event, to discard an expression. Also, it uses a completer function to allow tab autocompletion.
Source:
  • egg-repl.js, line 29

json2AST(node)

Generic JSON traversing building the AST with Egg specific classes.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
node Object JSON that represents a node of an AST.
Source:
  • j2a.js, line 15
Returns:
The equivalent class object tree to the input.

run(program)

This function parses an input program, then generates an AST with specific classes, and then it evaluates it to interpret a result.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
program String
Source:
  • egg-interpreter.js, line 206
Returns:
Result from the whole program evaluation.

runFromEVM(fileName)

This function parses an input JSON AST from a file, then generates an AST with specific classes, and then it evaluates it to interpret a result.
